key.name: show-home-title
key.summary: Show the home title and logout button in the window title if no window is selected and active (maximized)

key.name: show-application-title
key.summary: Show the application title when an application is active and maximized

key.name: icons-greyscale
key.summary: All icons except the current active window icon are greyed out. Disable to have colored icons for all windows

key.name: expand-task-list
key.summary: Whether the task list will expand automatically and use all available space.
